name: Tarentula cubensis
Relationship: Compare: ARS.; PYROG.; CROTAL.; ECHIN.; ANTHRAC.; BELLAD.; APIS.

Head: Dizziness after heat and hot perspiration
Dull ache on top of head
Shooting pain through left eye across frontal region
Gastric
Stomach feels hard, sore
Loss of appetite, except for breakfast
Skin: Abscesses, where pain and inflammation predominate

details: A toxaemic medicine, septic conditions. DIPHTHERIA. Adapted to the most severe types of inflammation and pain, early and persistent prostration. Various forms of malignant suppuration. Purplish hue and burning, stinging pains. Bubo. It is the remedy for PAIN OF DEATH; SOOTHES THE LAST STRUGGLES. PRURITUS, ESPECIALLY ABOUT GENITALS. Restless feet. Intermittent septic chills. Bubonic plague. As a curative and preventive remedy especially during the period of invasion.
